home.title: Welcome to the Islamic Knowledge Hub
home.subtitle: Explore and enhance your understanding of Islam through our interactive learning and gaming.

learningMode.title: IQRA Learning Mode
learningMode.description: Learn at your own pace with our comprehensive Islamic knowledge quiz system
learningMode.content: The IQRA learning mode provides a structured approach to learning about various aspects of Islam. Test your knowledge, learn from explanations, and track your progress across different categories.

challengeMode.title: IQRA Challenge Mode
challengeMode.description: Test your knowledge and compete with others in timed challenges
challengeMode.content: The IQRA challenge mode puts your Islamic knowledge to the test with timed quizzes and competitive leaderboards. Challenge yourself and others to see who has the best understanding of Islamic topics.
